text_block_list.text:
Today is a day off, the perfect time to head to the local 
shopping mall for some grocery shopping. Except...

I found Mihono Bourbon standing motionless 
in front of the arcade inside the mall.
choice_data_list: What are you up to, Bourbon?
What are you up to, Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I went to investigate the arcade in an attempt to 
improve my social skills. But I'm hesitant to enter...

I asked her for more details, and she explained that she 
wanted to master a social skill known as 'small talk' at 
this arcade, which is popular among her classmates.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Seeing the size of those arcade machines triggered my 
risk management system. There is a high risk of the 
machines breaking if I were to touch them.

So she's afraid of breaking the machines. 
In that case...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I appreciate your help with my observation.

I decided to help her out by playing the games for her, 
so she could observe in peace.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Order accepted. Starting 'enjoy ourselves' procedure.
And thus started her observation.

text_block_list.name: Rock Paper Scissors Machine
text_block_list.text:
Rock, paper, scissors! 
You lose!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
1 win, 9 losses. I detect a sudden negative change in your 
mood, Master. Sweet foods have a relaxing effect. 
How about getting some ice cream?

text_block_list.name: Slot Machine
text_block_list.text: Ding-ding-ding! You win the jackpot!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I detect a huge output of coins from the machine. 
Did it break?

text_block_list.name: Boxing Machine
text_block_list.text: 16,000 points! Hooray, you sent the monster flying!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Determining Master's punching strength as 16,000. 
I am trying to log the value, but what unit of 
measurement is this?

Even though she was still a bit disconnected, 
she was still satisfied at the end of the day.
Yet, I couldn't call it a day without having her try at least one game.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You want me to use the claw machine with you? 
Sadly, I will not touch it. It might break if I do.

I told her to look at the claw from the side of the 
machine and give me instructions. She gave me 
an understanding nod.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Order accepted. I will help you 
with accurate measurements.

With that, I chose to play 3 times for 500 yen. 
My target is a small bunny plush that seems easy to get.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Please move the claw 22 centimeters across. 
According to my calculations, there should be 
a 98% chance of success.

Just as planned, the claw lowered and gripped 
the bunny around its neck. But then...
*thump*

As the claw raised up, the bunny slipped through 
its grasp and fell right back down.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Observed the claw's lack of strength. Recalculating...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Switching to strategy 'push the bunny'. 
With this strategy, the winning chance is 91%.
*bump*

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I overestimated the claw's ability to push. 
Recalculating...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: According to my new strategy, the chance is 75%...
*slip*

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...... 
Determined that this is a near-impossible mission...

We tried many things but in the end, 
we could not get the bunny out...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
My apologies, Master. My calculations were off because 
I could not fully understand the claw's strength.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
But I'm certain that there is a 70% chance 
of success, were we to try again...

I'm surprised she wants to keep going. 
Maybe she's more into it than I thought.
choice_data_list: Sure, let's try one more time!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Order accepted. I will make sure we get that bunny 
with all that I have.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Stop now. Move 14 centimeters forward. 
Use the arm to push the bunny towards the chute.

I do as she says and the bunny is pushed towards the 
edge of the chute. It slowly tilts over, towards the chute...

I watch it tilt with my breath held... 
Actually, Mihono Bourbon is holding her breath as well.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Go!
The bunny falls over into the chute.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your help today. Experiencing the arcade 
first-hand has taught me a lot and resulted in some 
valuable insights.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The feeling of excitement in my chest, and how my 
facial muscles relaxed on their own... I added these 
sensations to the topic of 'small talk' in my database.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: "Enjoyed myself?"

I explained to her that the sensations she felt are called 
'fun' and how that caused her to enjoy herself.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That's what 'fun' is...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I do not understand how using the claw machine 
caused these feelings of 'fun' when it was 
very counterproductive.

I had to choose my words in such a way 
that she would understand.
choice_data_list: <size=36>The goal of using the machine is to have fun.</size>

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...... 
I see. Status changed to 'shocked.'

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: New values inserted. Even if something seems useless at first glance, it may not be the case in the end.

As she speaks, she lightly strokes 
the bunny plush we won today.
